priority_items.content: Restructure storage from global to project-local
Create two-tier system: history/ and active/
Build context lifecycle management (aging, promotion, summarization)

recent_decisions.decision: Use project-local storage instead of global ~/.claude/todos/
recent_decisions.rationale: Reduces context overhead and improves project isolation
